<<<<<<< HEAD
The foundation of Christian religion: comprehended in three godlie and learned treatises. 1. Faith. 2. Hope. 3. Charitie L'Espine, Jean de, ca. 1506-1597. Traité de la foy. English. Veghelman, S.
[6], 359, [1] p.
Printed by Tho: Purfoot, for Iohn Royston, and William Bladon, and are to be sold at their shop at the great North dore of Paules, at the signe of the Bible, At London : An. Dom. 1612.
Translator's dedication signed: S. Veghelman. The first part is a translation of: L'Espine, Jean de. Traité de la foy. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
